segments.text: Hi . I want to open an account with you , so I can pay my bills by direct debit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a very popular way to pay nowadays , totally hassle free !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's what I thought . It's so much trouble coming down here or to the post office to pay all of my utility bills every month . So , what exactly do I need to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fill in this application and sign your name down here , at the bottom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you go . Is that it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just need to see some ID , like a passport for example .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here . What's the least I can pay in to get this account open ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We usually ask for 100 RIB , Sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , that's everything done for you . Here's your new cheque book , the cheque guarantee will follow in the post in a couple of days .
segments.speaker: S2
